bddtester.core.throwables

Class MultipleScenarioWrapperException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.junit.runners.model.MultipleFailureException
          • bddtester.core.throwables.MultipleScenarioWrapperException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MultipleScenarioWrapperException
extends org.junit.runners.model.MultipleFailureException
    Wraps multiple ScenarioExceptions.
    Author:
    ckeiner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultipleScenarioWrapperException(java.util.List<ScenarioException> exceptions, java.util.List<ScenarioError> errors)
      Combines a list of errors and exceptions, then calls the super constructor MultipleFailureException.MultipleFailureException(List).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Returns a String with the stack trace of every Throwable.
      Needed by JUnit and ExtentReports to display the errors and exceptions properly.
      void printStackTrace(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Prints the stack trace of every Throwable to the specified PrintStream.
